entry.title: Great Consensus Cleanup Revival
entry.summary: In the discussion about Bitcoin Core's implementation, it is highlighted that a specific approach is utilized, which can be observed in a particular code snippet found within the Bitcoin Core repository. For those interested in understanding the intricacies of this implementation, one can refer to the provided [snippet](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/41544b8f96dbc9c6b8998acd6522200d67cdc16d/src/validation.cppL4547-L4552) and additionally review section 4.1 of the referenced document for a comprehensive insight. This information underscores the methodological choices made in the development of Bitcoin Core, shedding light on its technical framework.
